meanings.definition: The condition of having the upper front teeth extend over the lower front teeth when the mouth is closed.
meanings.sent1: Her overbite made her smile unique.
meanings.sent2: The dentist noticed a slight overbite during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The overbite in the cartoon character's teeth added to its charm.
meanings.sent4: His overbite was like a tiny roof over his lower teeth.
meanings.sent5: The overbite in the photo was so pronounced, it was hard not to notice.

meanings.sent1: He accidentally overbite into the apple, leaving a mark.
meanings.sent2: The puppy tends to overbite when playing with toys.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her dog would overbite the whole sandwich if given a chance.
meanings.sent4: The shark's powerful jaws can easily overbite its prey.
meanings.sent5: The child learned not to overbite while eating to avoid hurting his gums.
